title: Narrative-Based Child Emotional Intelligence Enhancement Instructional Design Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language expression skills and understanding of child emotional development
context.additional_context: Training for adult learners aimed at strengthening language-related professional competencies, involving interactive simulation with children in a VR environment.

learning_goals: Learners apply narrative-based questioning techniques to derive children’s emotional experiences with 80% accuracy via VR simulation.
Learners design instructional strategies combining co-narration and literary narratives tailored to real-world cases.
Learners develop and present customized narrative intervention scenarios for enhancing children’s emotional intelligence through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
